summary: While unveiling a series of international conspiracies, an FBI agent is embroiled in a set of political intrigues.
cast: James Van Der Beek|Wendy Crewson|John Heard|Will Tiao|Tzi Ma|Leslie Hope|Kenneth Tsang|Chelcie Ross|Mintita Wattanakul|Adam Wang|Nirut Sirichanya|Thienchai Jayasvasti Jr.|Sahajak Boonthanakit|Pathomporn Tempark|Napatcha Suthimaithee|Tonray Ho|Joseph Anthony Foronda|Tim Grimm|Jason Wells|John Marengo|Peggy Roeder|Mary Beth Fisher|Attapol Klabob|Tanade Amornpiyalerk|Wallop Terathong|Charlie Ruedpokanon|Yi-Ho Su|Weera Lertsombath|Kittipong Subthawonpan|Henry Milton Chu|Stephen Oyoung|Andrew Lee|Jeff Albertson|Tommy Bartlett|Jay Disney|Tony Domino|Alex Duong|Naomi Heilmann|Michelle Higgins|Alec Holmes|Sun Hong|Bob Kolbey|Larry Kucharik|Lawrence G. Lozano|Deborah Lynn|Joseph Mazurk|Bill Merker|John Rainone Jr.|Lisa Wolf|Robert A. Young
title: Formosa Betrayed
